硩字的基本解释

硩
chè
摘取；采。
捣毁。

硩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chè］
［《廣韻》丑列切，入薛，徹。］
［《廣韻》他歷切，入錫，透。］
(1)毁；捣毁。
(2)采。参见“硩采”。

硩字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　硩； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页831第02
【唐韻】丑列切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】敕列切，?音徹。挑摘也。【說文】上摘山巖，空靑珊瑚墮之。　又【周禮·秋官】硩蔟氏掌覆夭鳥之巢。【註】蔟，巢也。以石投擲其巢而毀之也。鄭司農註：硩讀爲擿。　又【玉篇】天磿切，音惕。石中火也。

硩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
硩字的起名意思

暂无。

chè
Pluck; pluck.
Smashed.
Sieve
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chè］
["Guangyun" ugly column cut, into Xue, tore. ]
["Guangyun" he cuts through, enters the tin, and penetrates. ]
(1) Destroy; destroy.
(2) Picking. See "硩采".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　硩; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 831 02
[Tang Yun] Chou Lieqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Lieqie, sound thoroughly. Pick also. [Said the text] Picking up the rocks, the empty corals fall.　[Zhou Li·Qiuguan] Xingxu's palm covers the nest of the Yao bird. [Note] Kun, nest also. Throwing his nest with stones and ruining it. Zheng Sinong's Note: 硩 is pronounced 擿.　[Jade Chapter] The sky is cut, and the sound is vigilant. Fire in the stone.
